view_get_model
void * view_get_model(View *view)
Definition view.c:106

With clause for view model

Parameters
viewView instance pointer
typeView model type
codeCode block that will be executed between model lock and unlock
updateBool flag, if true, view will be updated after code block. Can be variable, so code block can decide if update is needed.

Definition at line 77 of file view.h.

Enumeration Type Documentation

◆ ViewModelType

enum ViewModelType

View model types

Enumerator
ViewModelTypeNone 

Model is not allocated

ViewModelTypeLockFree 

Model consist of atomic types and/or partial update is not critical for rendering. Lock free.

ViewModelTypeLocking 

Model access is guarded with mutex. Locking gui thread.
